head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DRESNER, RABBI SAMUEL H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DRESNER, RABBI SAMUEL H.

block.p: DRESNER-Rabbi Samuel H. The Riverdale Jewish Center mourns the loss of our distinguished member, Rabbi Samuel H. Dresner. We express profound condolences to his wife Ruth Dresner, his sisters, children, grandchildren, and the entire family. May they be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Jonathan I. Rosenblatt, Rabbi Tobias B. Schapiro, President
